title: Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City Stories
headline: Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City Stories
subtitle: Scan the QR Code to Download
content:
Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City Stories has been optimized for mobile devices with shorter, streamlined missions, updated real time lighting and shadows, upgraded textures and art, greater draw distance, performance enhancements for touch-based gaming like analog steering and rebalanced targeting, and cross-platform cloud saves.

Scan the QR Code to learn how to play Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City Stories on your mobile device for free as part of your GTA+ Membership.
